name: Black ink crow
description:
Black ink crow  is adventure game.

made in RPGMaker VX Ace.                                                                                                                             (You don't need RTP to launch this game.)

※This game has grotesque and objectionable expressions.

■Story
Crow, the main character of this game who regularly go to a psychiatry, lost his head.
Please find his head.                                                                                                                                     ■play time…10 minutes

■official site
